text: The Chronicles of Life and Death is the third studio album by American pop punk band, Good Charlotte. The Chronicles of Life and Death was released on October 5, 2004. It was released with both a "Life" and a "Death" version. The life version contained a bonus track called "Falling Away" which also featured the hidden track "Wounded". It was the first and last album to feature Chris Wilson on the drums. ==Songs== Category:2004 albums Category:Good Charlotte albums Category:Pop punk albums
